name: Meltdown (itch) (Zortog)
description:
This game was made in a weekend for Game Makers Tool kit GameJam 2020.

Theme: Out of Control.

You had enough studying for the last exam. Your brain can't handle it anymore and here comes the meltdown...

Fight against books through your mood swings:

  • Anger: Scortch books with fireball.
  • Joy: Dash all around defeating books in a single shot.
  • Sadness: Run away while leaving deadly pools of tears.
  • Fear: Just run, at this point you are incapacitated to study.
